entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain showers after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
